clip_assessment.verbatim_quote: YouTube is the second biggest search engine online next to Google.
clip_assessment.guest_voice: Sarah speaks like a teacher who's cracked a code — matter-of-fact, specific, and generous with what she knows. No fluff, just 'here's what works.'
clip_assessment.why_this_stops_scrolls: Most agents are burning out on Instagram and TikTok while completely ignoring the platform where buyers are actively searching for them.

HOOK.text: You're creating content on the wrong platform.
HOOK.production_note: Bold text overlay on black screen. Cut to Sarah mid-sentence, serious expression.

SETUP.text: Sarah Meslowski — top 1% agent in Metro Atlanta — gets 85% of her business from one place. Not Instagram. Not Facebook. Not even TikTok.
SETUP.production_note: B-roll: Sarah's YouTube channel dashboard showing subscriber count and video thumbnails. Quick cuts.

INSIGHT.text: YouTube is the second biggest search engine online next to Google. Think about that. When someone types 'best neighborhoods in Atlanta' — they're not scrolling for entertainment. They're searching with intent. Sarah's videos show up. Her phone rings. She's not chasing algorithms or posting three times a day. She created 200 videos over three years. They work for her 24/7. While other agents are stuck on the content hamster wheel, her old videos are still generating leads.
INSIGHT.production_note: Screen recording: YouTube search bar with 'moving to [city]' search. Show Sarah's videos ranking. Cut to her testimonial or speaking. Show analytics: views over time graph trending up on older videos.

REFRAME.text: Here's what changes: you stop performing for an audience and start answering the questions your buyers are already typing. Your content becomes an asset, not a daily obligation.
REFRAME.production_note: Split screen: left side shows frantic agent posting Stories, right side shows Sarah's evergreen video getting views months later. Calm vs. chaos.

CTA.text: Open YouTube right now. Search 'moving to [your city].' See who owns that space. Then ask yourself — why isn't it you?
CTA.production_note: Direct to camera. Sarah looking at viewer. Text overlay: 'Who owns YOUR market on YouTube?' Fade to logo/handle.

caption: 85% of her business comes from YouTube. Here's why you're ignoring your biggest opportunity.
share_trigger: utility — agents will tag their team or save this as a reminder to finally start their YouTube channel
